Text: Nike's stock surged in the days after the campaign debuted, increasing the company's value by more than $6 billion two weeks later.
Cause: Nike's stock surged in the days after the campaign debuted
Effect: increasing the company's value by more than $6 billion two weeks later.
Sentence: <e1>Nike's stock surged in the days after the campaign debuted</e1>, <e2>increasing the company's value by more than $6 billion two weeks later.</e2>
